location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter concerns the whereabouts of various East India Company ships and the timing of dispatches to Bussora [Basra]. William Bruce states that he hopes that the Board will approve of his sending dispatches as early as possible rather than waiting to hear from the Assistant in Charge at Bussora.
